title: Joint Statement on the Day of the Endangered Lawyer
content: Joint Statement on the Day of the Endangered Lawyer melkumyam Sat, 01/24/2026 - 14:22 Type Joint statement Countries Russia Turkey Afghanistan Iran Tanzania China Page blocks Today, January 24th, marks the International Day of the Endangered Lawyer. In recognition of endangered lawyers around the world, we, the undersigned, express our deep alarm at the growing repression of lawyers worldwide for the legitimate exercise of their professional duties. Attacks on lawyers strike at the very heart of...
